entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:16 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 6. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
